sentences.cn: …一流的恐怖片制片人劳伦斯·伍希。

sentences.en: A good negotiator always has more than one ace in the hole.
sentences.cn: 谈判高手总有数张王牌在手.

sentences.en: Agassi believed he had served an ace at 5-3 (40-30) in the deciding set.
sentences.cn: 阿加西认为他在决胜盘中5-3(40-30)时曾发出过一记Ace球。

sentences.en: came within an ace of losing the election.
deciding to play her ace, Emily showed the letter to Vic.
sentences.cn: 艾米丽决定使出杀手锏，把信拿给维克看。

sentences.en: He is an ace mechanic . He can repair any cars.
sentences.cn: 他是一流的机械师,什么车都会修.

sentences.en: He was intent on murder and he came within an ace of succeeding.
sentences.cn: 他一心想杀人并且差点就得逞了。

sentences.en: He was within an ace of death / being killed.
His strength in a crisis is an ace in the hole.
sentences.cn: 临危不惧是他的看家本领.

sentences.en: I came within an ace of dismissing him then.
sentences.cn: 那时我几乎要把他解雇.

sentences.en: I'd been doing some quiet investigating in the meantime and had an ace up my sleeve.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，我不动声色地展开了调查，掌握了一张王牌。

sentences.en: I'll not wag an ace further.
Our superior technology is our ace in the hole.
sentences.cn: 我们超众的技术是我们的法宝。

sentences.en: That is the third ace that he has served this match.
sentences.cn: 那是他在这场比赛中的第3次发球得分.

sentences.en: That's what he's waiting for. ` That's his ace in the hole. "
sentences.cn: 这就是他梦寐以求的, 这也就是他的王牌. ”

sentences.en: The car came within an ace of hitting the old man.
sentences.cn: 那车子差点儿撞上那老人.

sentences.en: The child came within an ace of being drowned.
The plane had a breakdown in the air, but it was fortunately removed by the ace pilot.
sentences.cn: 飞机在空中发生了故障, 但幸运的是被王牌驾驶员排除了.

sentences.en: Your ace and king won't make until you've drawn trumps.
sentences.cn: 非等到你把王牌吊光,你的么点和老K赢不到牌.

phrases.tran_cn: 锦囊妙计：隐藏的优势或资源，一直保存到需要时
血管紧张素转化酶抑制剂

phrases.phrase: ace up one's sleeve(或北美 in the hole)
phrases.tran_cn: 手中握有王牌；有应急妙计

trans.tran_cn: A纸牌，擅长…的人，（网球中的）发球得分
trans.tran_en: a first shot in tennis or  volleyball  which is hit so well that your opponent cannot reach the ball and you win the point
